name: richtexteditor
author: Siemens Product Lifecycle Management Software Inc.

newCommentVisible.expression: (ctx.viewerContext.type=='aw-pdf-viewer' || ctx.viewerContext.type=='aw-2d-viewer' || ctx.viewerContext.type=='aw-image-viewer' || ctx.viewerContext.type=='aw-text-viewer' || ctx.viewerContext.type=='aw-html-viewer' ||  ctx.reqMarkupCtx.viewerType=='aw-requirement-ckeditor' || ctx.markup.keep) && ctx.commentContext
